Package com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui

Interface Summary
OAuthWebviewHelper.OAuthWebviewHelperEvents the host activity/fragment should pass in an implementation of this interface so that it can notify it of things it needs to do as part of the oauth process.
 

Class Summary
CustomServerUrlEditor Custom dialog to allow the user to set a label and url to use for the login.
LoginActivity Login Activity: takes care of authenticating the user.
NativeMainActivity Native application main activity should extend this activity or duplicate its functionality
OAuthWebviewHelper Helper class to manage a WebView instance that is going through the OAuth login process.
OAuthWebviewHelper.AccountOptions Class encapsulating the parameters required to create a new account
PasscodeActivity Passcode activity: takes care of creating/verifying a user passcode.
SalesforceDroidGapActivity Class that defines the main activity for a PhoneGap-based application.
SalesforceGapViewClient  
SalesforceR Before 1.3, SalesforceSDK was packaged as a jar which can't have resources.
ServerPickerActivity UI to change the login server url to use during an oAuth flow If the user selects one of the prefabs, save the selected index and the final url into SharedPrefs[SERVER_URL_PREFS_SETTINGS] If the user selects a custom url, that subsystem saves the final validated not null label and url AND saves the selectedindex.
 

Enum Summary
PasscodeActivity.PasscodeMode
